conversation.text: I'd highly recommend giving "Memento" a watch! This thought-provoking film tells the story of a man with short-term memory loss who is trying to solve his wife's murder, featuring an impressive cast including Guy Pearce and Carrie-Anne Moss. If you're looking for something a bit different, "The Merchant of Venice" is a classic tragic comedy from Shakespeare, updated to the 1930s, exploring themes of justice and prejudice, with a captivating performance by Al Pacino as Shylock. Enjoy your movie time!
